Penance Rangers are only encountered during the Barbarian Assault minigame. Like Penance Fighters, they can only be killed by the Attacker. There are four ways to damage this monster:

  1. Combat-style/arrow-type/magic-spell announced by Collector
    • Controlled/Bullet/Wind
    • Accurate/Field/Water
    • Aggressive/Blunt/Earth
    • Defensive/Barbed/Fire
  2. Poisons (from both weapons and green eggs)
  3. Egg fired from the Egg Launcher
  4. Recoil damage from any player

No experience is gained from damaging this monster.

'''Penance Rangers''' are only encountered during the [[Barbarian Assault]] [[minigame]]. Like [[Penance Fighter]]s, they can only be killed by the [[Attacker]]. There are four ways to damage this monster:
#Combat-style/arrow-type/magic-spell announced by [[Collector]]
#*Controlled/Bullet/[[Wind spells|Wind]]
#*Accurate/Field/[[Water spells|Water]]
#*Aggressive/Blunt/[[Earth spells|Earth]]
#*Defensive/Barbed/[[Fire spells|Fire]]
#Poisons (from both weapons and green eggs)
#Egg fired from the Egg Launcher
#[[Recoil (disambiguation)|Recoil damage]] from any player

No experience is gained from damaging this monster.
